title: Kylie Jenner Responds To Breakup With Hot Snaps: Orange You Glad She's Single?
text:
Kylie Jenner returned to Instagram for the first time since her split with Travis Scott and she looks better than ever!

The newly-single "KUWTK" star posted several fierce pics of herself and showed she's wearing her breakup well.

Related:

Kylie Jenner Seen With Tyga Soon After Travis Scott Breakup

Kylie Jenner Is Facing Criticism From Fans Over What She Wore To Justin And Hailey Bieber's Wedding

Travis Scott Shares First Post Since Kylie Jenner Breakup, Fans Beg For Reconciliation

Kylie Jenner & Travis Scott Still Follow Each Other on Social Media Despite Breakup

Kylie Jenner Posted This On Instagram Before Split With Travis Scott

Check Her Out!

Kylie flaunted her famous curves in a tight bright orange jumpsuit on Wednesday night.

Pairing the look with a "$10,000" blinged-out money purse, the youngest billionaire proved that she's still got business on the brain.

Single Looks Good!

In a close-up that she posted of herself, Stormi Webster's mama beams with confidence.

"Hi October ..." Kylie captioned the shots, proving she's ready to move forward without her former rapper beau.

The Split!

As The Blast reported, Kylie and Travis are taking some time apart after several years together.

We're told the Kylie Cosmetics founder and "Astroworld" rapper have "broke up and gotten back together several times" within the last few weeks, and are trying to figure out if a permanent breakup is what they want.
description: Single Kylie hit IG with her hottest selfies yet.
